EmailTemplate.name: Lighthouse Received All Pins
EmailTemplate.subject: Lighthouse Received your Google and Bing Pin Numbers!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for submitting your Google and Bing PIN codes. This email confirms that we have all of the information we need from you in order to complete the setup of your Maps profile pages.
Our top priority is making your account a successful one, so please don’t hesitate to contact us with any questions.
Thank you!
Lighthouse Support 888.427.5454 support@lighthousepmg.com
© {!User.Today_s_Year__c} Web.com Group, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
